user_instruction: 'Compose an email to introduce me to Sarah (sarah@zenithinnovations.com). You can check out my Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Here are the key points you can include in the introduction email to Sarah:

• Title / Role: Junior Data Analyst  
• Project Focus: Supporting the Adaptive Analytics initiative—building data pipelines and dashboards to help the team develop AI-driven marketing optimization tools.  
• Personal Notes: Excited to collaborate, eager to learn from Sarah’s experience, and happy to share best practices around data visualization.  
• Preferred Contact: Email (john.doe@zenithinnovations.com) and Slack (@john).

Let me know if you need anything else or if you’d like any tweaks!

final_output:
